meta_title: What Is CMMS? Definition, Benefits, and Key Functions
meta_description: A CMMS (Computerized Maintenance Management System) centralizes maintenance data and automates workflows to improve asset reliability and reduce downtime.
title: What Is CMMS?

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What Is CMMS?

image_prompt: A high-tech, photo-realistic industrial setting showing a maintenance manager in professional PPE (hard hat, safety vest) holding a rugged tablet. The tablet screen displays a clean, modern dashboard with charts and equipment status. In the background, a clean, well-lit manufacturing floor with robotic arms and conveyors is visible. The lighting is bright and professional, emphasizing a modern, efficient "profit center" atmosphere. No text on the screen or in the image.
